item.title: Why is math so abstract
item.description: Motivation Have you ever wondered why is math so abstract? In this article I want to dive deeper into this question and give you some examples to demonstrate what actually is abstraction in math. What is abstract?? First let’s make clear what we mean by word abstract. Abstract thing is something that only exist as a thought or an idea. It isn’t something that exist in real world. For example a line.

item.title: How I ended up engaged with math
item.description: Motivation Well… often times people around me say things like “I hate math. It is hard. I’m not a math person, so I suck at it… Why do we have to learn this subject although it is totally useless in life and is only pain for most of the students?” You know… I like math and I know a lot about it’s applications thus whenever I hear something like this.
